reviewText: Am look for hole pack collection  I need it
Great Old School Kung Fu movie set

This is a great set, especially for the price. I didn't get mine at Amazon, but f.y.i.(and a nod's as good as a wink to a blind man, nudge nudge, wink wink), you can find this set and quite a few more that feature other martial artists like Jet Li, Chen Kuan Tai, Lo Lieh, Gordom Liu, Ti Lung (those are the sets I have), and others that I'd go out of my way to find if I knew where to look. The Shaw Bros and that glorious ShawScope cinematic experience can't be beat... Unless you know Kung Fu, fooz!

I ordered this DVD, but it never came. I understand that the user that I bought it from is no longer using Amazon. I just wanted to watch these films, and the jerk never sent it to me. I urge people to order through reliable sources if it is something other than Amazon. Wasted 17 bucks like that.....
